about_the_game:
2018. Early in the morning, Daniel wakes up from an unexpected call. His best friend Dmitry called him with a very unusual request - to collect some stones…

Daniel is the main character of the game, an ordinary guy living in a small town, unlike Dmitry, who has already managed to achieve the main success in his life - he became the director of the main laboratory of the world.

Once upon a time Dmitry helped Daniel and now the main character has to help his friend find some stones by going on a crazy and dangerous adventure full of secrets and riddles.

Main features of the game:

  • Modern and beautiful graphics
  • Two types of weapons: melee and ranged combat
  • Dangerous opponents who mimic ordinary people
  • Locations where you can take a walk and admire the environment
  • An unpredictable plot that will surprise you very much

name: Theory of Poltaran

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3250
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 / AMD Radeon HD 6950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 3GB / AMD Radeon RX 570 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD recommended

short_description: Theory of Poltaran is an action - adventure game where players can explore the surroundings of locations, participate in battles with creatures from laboratories, as well as fully immerse themselves in a fantastic plot.
supported_languages:
English, Russian*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Hungarian, Portuguese - Portugal, Ukrainian, Czech
*languages with full audio support
